title: Statement by Vice President Biden on the Resignation of Congresswoman Gabrielle Giffords | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Vice President


For Immediate Release
January 22, 2012

 



Statement by Vice President Biden on the Resignation of Congresswoman Gabrielle Giffords





	I spoke with Gabbyâ€™s husband Mark today and told him that the most important thing is Gabby's recovery. We fully support their decision. I know that Gabby will continue to make significant contributions to her state and country, and I stand with her in whatever endeavor she decides to pursue. Jill and I wish Gabby and Mark all the best as they embark on the next phase of recovery.

	###
